word[0]: have/be nothing to do with somebody/something
definition[0]: if you have nothing to do with someone or something, or if someone or something has nothing to do with you, you are not involved or connected with it
example[0]: He said that he had nothing to do with the decision.
example[1]: As I said, it’s nothing to do with me.
example[2]: That’s got nothing to do with you.
example[3]: I want nothing to do with (=do not want to be involved) the whole thing.
example[4]: My staff had nothing whatsoever to do with this.
